languages.text: Псайкеры опасны для всех, кто их окружает (включая самих себя). Каждое применение {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g} истончает вуаль между реальным миром и варпом, увеличивая {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Истончение завесы{/g}. Дальнейшее использование психосил провоцирует появление {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} (это явление снижает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} отряда). Когда значение Истончения завесы достигнет 15, каждое следующее использование значимых психосил может спровоцировать проявление {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Угроз варпа{/g} — опасного события, последствия которого невозможно предсказать, а потому лучше избегать.
languages.original_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Psychic Powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}Psychic Phenomena{/g} that reduces the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Momentum{/g}.
Each use of Psychic Powers thins the veil between the realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil Degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of Psychic Powers will trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Perils of the Warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with the consequences that cannot be predicted.

traits.locale_text:
Псайкеры опасны не только для врагов, но и для всех, кто находится рядом (включая самих себя).
При использовании {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g} псайкер и его союзники могут подвергнуться {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-мороку{/g} — явлению, уменьшающему значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} отряда.
Каждое применение психосил истончает вуаль между реальным миром и варпом, усиливая {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истощение завесы{/g}. Когда его значение достигнет 15, каждое следующее использование психосил может спровоцировать проявление {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} — опасного события, последствия которого невозможно предсказать.

Каждое применение психосил истончает вуаль между реальным миром и варпом, усиливая {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истощение завесы{/g}. Когда его значение достигнет 15, каждое следующее использование психосил может спровоцировать проявление {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} — опасного события, последствия которого невозможно предсказать.

traits.locale_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using Psychic Powers, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to Psychic Phenomena that reduces the level of the party's Momentum.
Each use of Psychic Powers thins the veil between the realspace and the warp, increasing Veil Degradation. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of Psychic Powers will trigger Perils of the Warp, a random and dangerous event that cannot be predicted.

Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

languages.text:
Los psíquicos no son peligrosos para sus enemigos, sino para todos los que les rodean (y para sí mismos).
Al usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}, el psíquico y sus aliados pueden sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g}, que reducen el nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del grupo.
Cada uso de poderes psíquicos debilita el velo entre el espacio real y la disformidad, lo que aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g}. Cuando su valor llegue a 15, cada uso de poderes psíquicos podrá causar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, un evento aleatorio y peligroso de consecuencias impredecibles.
languages.original_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

traits.locale_text:
Los psíquicos no son peligrosos para sus enemigos, sino para todos los que les rodean (y para sí mismos).
Al usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}, el psíquico y sus aliados pueden sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g}, que reducen el nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del grupo.
Cada uso de poderes psíquicos debilita el velo entre el espacio real y la disformidad, lo que aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g}. Cuando su valor llegue a 15, cada uso de poderes psíquicos podrá causar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, un evento aleatorio y peligroso de consecuencias impredecibles.

languages.text:
異能者は敵だけでなく、（自分自身を含む）周囲の人間にとっても危険だ。
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を使用すると、異能者とその仲間は、パーティーの{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}のレベルを低下させる{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}にさらされる可能性がある。
超能力を使うたびにリアルスペースと<歪み>の間のヴェールが薄くなり、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が進む。その値が15に達すると、それ以降超能力を使うたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}、つまり予測不可能な結果をもたらすランダムで危険な出来事を引き起こす可能性がある。
languages.original_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

traits.locale_text:
異能者は敵だけでなく、（自分自身を含む）周囲の人間にとっても危険だ。
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を使用すると、異能者とその仲間は、パーティーの{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}のレベルを低下させる{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}にさらされる可能性がある。
超能力を使うたびにリアルスペースと<歪み>の間のヴェールが薄くなり、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が進む。その値が15に達すると、それ以降超能力を使うたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}、つまり予測不可能な結果をもたらすランダムで危険な出来事を引き起こす可能性がある。

languages.text:
灵能者不仅对敌人而言很危险，对他们身边所有人（包括他们自己）而言，也同样很危险。
使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}时，灵能者与所有盟友都可能会受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}的影响，导致队伍{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}降低。
每次使用灵能能力时，都会导致真实世界与亚空间之间的屏障变得更加脆弱，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度也会随之提高。当障壁恶化程度到达15之后，接下来每次使用灵能能力，都有可能会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。这是一种极其危险的随机事件，可能会产生无法预料的后果。
languages.original_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

traits.locale_text:
灵能者不仅对敌人而言很危险，对他们身边所有人（包括他们自己）而言，也同样很危险。
使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}时，灵能者与所有盟友都可能会受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}的影响，导致队伍{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}降低。
每次使用灵能能力时，都会导致真实世界与亚空间之间的屏障变得更加脆弱，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度也会随之提高。当障壁恶化程度到达15之后，接下来每次使用灵能能力，都有可能会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。这是一种极其危险的随机事件，可能会产生无法预料的后果。

languages.text:
Psioniker sind nicht nur für ihre Gegner gefährlich, sondern für jeden in ihrer Umgebung (einschließlich sich selbst).
Beim Einsatz von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräften{/g} können der Psioniker und seine Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomenen{/g} ausgesetzt sein, die die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe verringern.
Durch jeden Einsatz von psionischen Kräften wird der Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp schwächer und erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g}. Wenn der Wert 15 erreicht, kann jeder weitere Einsatz von psionischen Kräften {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} auslösen, ein zufälliges und gefährliches Ereignis mit unvorhersehbaren Folgen.
languages.original_text:
Psykers are dangerous not only to their enemies, but to everyone around them (including themselves).
When using {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker and their allies can be subjected to {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} that reduce the level of the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}.
Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.

Beim Einsatz von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräften{/g} können der Psioniker und seine Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomenen{/g} ausgesetzt sein, die die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}der Gruppe verringern.
Durch jeden Einsatz von psionischen Kräften wird der Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp schwächer und erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g}. Wenn der Wert 15 erreicht, kann jeder weitere Einsatz von psionischen Kräften {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} auslösen, ein zufälliges und gefährliches Ereignis mit unvorhersehbaren Folgen.

languages.text:
Les psykers sont dangereux pour leurs ennemis, de même que pour ceux qui les entourent (y compris eux-mêmes).
Lorsqu'il utilise ses {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, le psyker et ses alliés peuvent être soumis à des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} qui réduisent le niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} du groupe.
Chaque utilisation des pouvoirs psychiques réduit le voile entre l'espace réel et le Warp, ce qui augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g}. Lorsque sa valeur atteint 15, chaque utilisation ultérieure des pouvoirs psychiques peut déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}, un événement aléatoire et dangereux aux conséquences imprévisibles.

Each use of psychic powers thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. When its value reaches 15, each subsequent use of psychic powers has the possibility of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, a random and dangerous event with unpredictable consequences.
